trans-unit.source: Contains methods, properties, and events to support navigation.
trans-unit.target: 包含方法、 屬性和事件，以支援導覽。

trans-unit.source: NavigationService encapsulates the ability to download content within the context of a browser-style navigation.
trans-unit.target: NavigationService 封裝能夠下載的瀏覽器樣式瀏覽內容中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Content can be any type of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] object and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] files.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是任何類型的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)]物件和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)]檔案。

trans-unit.source: In general, however, pages are the preferred as the way to package content for navigation (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，不過，頁面是慣用的套件內容，以瀏覽方式時 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by providing an instance of an object and calling an overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method that accepts an object: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> Alternatively, content can be navigated to by passing a relative or absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> When content is navigated to by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], NavigationService will return an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以藉由提供的物件執行個體並呼叫的多載，導覽至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>接受物件的方法:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>或者，內容可以巡覽至藉由傳遞相對或絕對[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>方法多載接受[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>當內容導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，NavigationService 會傳回包含內容的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: 可巡覽的存留期追蹤透過下列事件:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: 發生巡覽; 每次引發並非所有的事件引發的事件組取決的類型 （內容或內容片段），就會發生的瀏覽和巡覽完成的方式 （取消、 已停止或失敗）。

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events are raised: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") During or after a navigation, NavigationService provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>), the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 下圖說明這些事件的引發順序︰![頁面巡覽流程圖](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "頁面巡覽流程圖")NavigationService 期間或之後的導覽，提供所巡覽，包括內容的相關資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]正要巡覽之內容 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>)、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]目前內容的 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>)，並包含所巡覽之內容的物件 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>)。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, NavigationService records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 當內容導覽至時，NavigationService 會記錄為項目導覽巡覽記錄中。

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 項目加入備份瀏覽歷程記錄，其中一個新的瀏覽發生時，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>方法，或瀏覽至 向前巡覽記錄中的項目，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目向前巡覽記錄瀏覽至的項目在上一步瀏覽歷程記錄，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>報表是否有後方的項目及向前巡覽記錄，分別。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，移除向後巡覽記錄中最新的項目，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, NavigationService does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，NavigationService 不會在瀏覽歷程記錄中儲存內容物件執行的個體。

trans-unit.source: Instead, NavigationService creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，NavigationService 建立內容物件的新執行個體使用巡覽記錄中巡覽至每一次。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 此行為被為了避免過多的記憶體耗用量在巡覽大量內容時。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供幾項技術之可以將一段內容的狀態儲存在瀏覽歷程記錄。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>，您也可以記住多重集的單一頁面的執行個體的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: NavigationService is `sealed` class and, therefore, cannot be instantiated; instead, NavigationService is used by navigators to enable navigation.
trans-unit.target: NavigationService 是`sealed`類別，並因此，無法具現化; 相反地，NavigationService 正由導覽器來瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], there are two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，有兩個導覽器: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience.
trans-unit.target: 以視覺化的方式，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]為導覽器，以提供整合的使用者經驗。

trans-unit.source: Physically, however, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the navigator; the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and the navigation history that is managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] in the following ways: - When content is navigated to by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> from within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the relevant navigation history entries are also added to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 實際，不過[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]實際使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>導覽; 為<xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]中執行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]會傳回參考<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>，和管理的瀏覽歷程記錄<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>整合由管理的瀏覽歷程記錄[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]以下列方式:-內容藉由呼叫巡覽時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]相關的瀏覽歷程記錄項目也會新增至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]瀏覽歷程記錄。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - When entries in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] causes NavigationService to navigate back or forwards to the content that is associated with those entries.
trans-unit.target: -當中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會選取[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]導致瀏覽回 NavigationService 或轉送給與那些項目相關聯的內容。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> can provide its own navigation history, or use the navigation history of the navigator that hosts it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>可以提供自己的瀏覽歷程記錄，或使用瀏覽歷程記錄的裝載。 請 [導覽器]</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides its own navigation history, it can display its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to navigate through the entries in navigation history; those entries are not added to the navigation history of the host navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) and, consequently, cannot be navigated to from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of each (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>提供自己的瀏覽歷程記錄，它可以顯示其本身的瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]來瀏覽導覽記錄中; 中的項目那些項目不會加入至主機導覽巡覽歷程記錄 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)])，因此，無法瀏覽至從瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]每個 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將備份瀏覽歷程記錄，其中包含的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: AddBackEntry, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> are used to help remember multiple sets of state for the current content.
trans-unit.target: AddBackEntry， <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>，和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>用來協助您記住多重集的目前內容的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref>物件，表示與特定的內容相關聯的應用程式定義狀態。

trans-unit.source: state is , and a object isn't returned from .
trans-unit.target: state是 ，和物件不從傳回。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示向後巡覽記錄中是否至少一個項目。

trans-unit.source: CanGoBack to determine whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷向後巡覽記錄中是否至少一個項目 CanGoBack。

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> is called and there are no entries in back navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 應檢查這個屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; 如果<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>稱為和向後巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > that if navigation history is shared by multiple navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the most recent entry in back navigation history may not have been added by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> for the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，如果巡覽歷程記錄由多個導覽器共用 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)、 最新的項目在上一步瀏覽歷程記錄可能未新增由<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>為目前的導覽器。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果沒有至少一個項目中向後巡覽記錄中;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出向前巡覽記錄中是否至少一個項目。

trans-unit.source: CanGoForward to determine whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷向前巡覽記錄中是否至少一個項目 CanGoForward。

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> is called and there are no entries in forward navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 應檢查這個屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; 如果<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>稱為向前巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目和<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in forward navigation history; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果向前巡覽記錄中; 沒有至少一個項目否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含目前的內容物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Content can be set in one of two ways: - Directly, by setting it to a reference to an object.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以設定中有兩種:-直接將它設定為物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: - Indirectly, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -間接，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> initiates a new navigation; since navigation is asynchronous, Content won't return a value if it is inspected immediately after being set.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>起始新的瀏覽; 因為導覽是非同步的內容不會傳回值，如果它設定之後，立即檢查。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: An object that is a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含目前的內容物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content that was last navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 取得[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]之內容的上一次瀏覽至。

trans-unit.source: The value of the CurrentSource property is not changed until navigation to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] has completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: CurrentSource 屬性的值不會變更至不同的瀏覽之前[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]已順利完成。

trans-unit.source: CurrentSource can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 可以使用片段僅設定 CurrentSource [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>內容是上一次瀏覽，如果使用導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: 導覽至內容片段開始時，立即發生所需的片段是否在目前內容中，或來源之後，就會發生[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]已載入內容，如果想要的片段位在不同的內容。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref>導覽內容包含指定的<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A navigator has a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that handles content navigation.
trans-unit.target: 具有導覽<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>可處理內容巡覽。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] has two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]有兩個導覽器︰<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: To process navigation requests and manage navigation lifetime, a navigator uses the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] navigation service, which is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理巡覽要求，以及管理巡覽存留期，巡覽器會使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]瀏覽服務，它會實作為<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a navigator can get a reference to the navigator's <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> by calling the GetNavigationService method.
trans-unit.target: 由導覽所裝載的內容可以取得 [導覽器] 的參考<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>藉由呼叫 GetNavigationService 方法。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: GetNavigationService returns `null` when the `dependencyObject`: - Is a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 GetNavigationService`null`時`dependencyObject`:-為<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> that: 1.
trans-unit.target: -這是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>，︰ 1。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Is hosted by another navigator.
trans-unit.target: 由另一個導覽所裝載。

trans-unit.source: Has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.
trans-unit.target: 具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>其

trans-unit.source: - Is not part of content that is hosted by a navigator.
trans-unit.target: -這不是屬於由導覽所裝載的內容。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] offers two shortcuts for acquiring a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that processed the navigation to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> can be accessed from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> itself by getting the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供取得參考的兩個快速鍵<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>，處理瀏覽到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>可以存取從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>本身所取得的值及其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that is used by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to process navigation can be accessed by getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>，會由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>處理功能可以存取所取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.target: 參考<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref>導覽內容包含指定的<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>; 可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>在某些情況下 （請參閱 < 備註 >）。

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至最新的項目在上一步瀏覽歷程記錄，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Before calling GoBack, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫 GoBack，<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>屬性可檢查以判斷向後巡覽記錄中是否有項目。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: GoBack is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 向後巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目時，會呼叫 GoBack。

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the most recent entry in forward navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的話，請瀏覽向前巡覽記錄中最新的項目。

trans-unit.source: Before calling GoForward, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫 GoForward<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>屬性可檢查以判斷向前巡覽記錄中是否有項目。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>

trans-unit.source: GoForward is called when there are no entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: GoForward 是在向前巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: 發生於所巡覽的內容已載入，剖析，並開始呈現。

trans-unit.source: You handle LoadCompleted if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request upon load completion.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要探索有關巡覽要求完成負載的相關資訊，請處理 LoadCompleted。

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the LoadCompleted event handler, and includes: - The content and its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊可從<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>物件，傳遞至 LoadCompleted 事件處理常式，並包括:-內容及其[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: -[導覽器] (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -如果透過呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>初始化巡覽其他資料

trans-unit.source: - Response details (using a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object).
trans-unit.target: -回應詳細資料 (使用<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>物件)。</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: LoadCompleted is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當 [來源] 頁面無法找到或載入，在此情況下，不會引發 LoadCompleted <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>，就會引發。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises LoadCompleted, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>引發 LoadCompleted，它也會引發<xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>事件<xref:System.Windows.Application>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: 非同步巡覽至物件所包含的內容。

trans-unit.source: Navigate will navigate to the <xref:System.Object> specified by `root` if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽會瀏覽至<xref:System.Object>所指定`root`如果下列條件成立:-<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>事件不會取消。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: - A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: -Web 要求 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) 可由。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: If `root` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果`root`是`null`，則現有內容 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) 會清除。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 網頁內容下載，您可能會收到 Web 例外狀況 (例如，404︰ 找不到檔案)。

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>從這類例外狀況

trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要瀏覽至內容。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is specified by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式巡覽至所指定的內容[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The value of `source` can be a Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] or a valid pack [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] (see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: 值`source`可以是 Web[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]或有效的組件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)](請參閱[WPF 中的組件 Uri](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))。

trans-unit.source: Navigate will navigate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by `source` if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽會瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]所指定`source`如果下列條件成立:-<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>事件不會取消。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: - A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: -Web 要求 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) 可由。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: If `source` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果`source`是`null`，則現有內容 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) 會清除。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 網頁內容下載，您可能會收到 Web 例外狀況 (例如，404︰ 找不到檔案)。

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>從這類例外狀況

trans-unit.source: You can use Navigate to navigate to a content fragment.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 瀏覽以瀏覽至內容片段。

trans-unit.source: If the content identified by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is the current content, it is not downloaded again.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]是目前內容，它就不會再次下載。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>物件使用初始化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的所需的內容。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object, and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式瀏覽內容所包含的物件，並傳遞物件，包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。

trans-unit.source: This method has the same behavior as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, although an object is passed instead of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法具有相同的行為<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，不過，而不是傳遞物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要瀏覽至內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式瀏覽位於來源內容[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，並傳遞物件，包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。

trans-unit.source: Since navigations are asynchronous, it is possible for multiple navigations to be in progress at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽是非同步的因為它可能會在同一時間可進行多個導覽。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two child frames on a single page, both frames could be navigating.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果在單一頁面上有兩個子框架，則無法瀏覽這兩個框架。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the various navigation events that are raised by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> may be raised multiple times, one for each piece of content that is being navigated to, and not necessarily in order that the navigations were requested.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，所引發的各種導覽事件<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>可能會引發的多次，一個用於每一項，在巡覽的內容且不一定順序來巡覽要求。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, if a particular navigation request needs to process data that is specific to the individual request, it cannot use data that is available to all navigation requests.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果特定瀏覽要求需要處理的個別要求特定資料，它就無法使用可瀏覽的所有要求的資料。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use `navigationState` to pass data for navigation processing that is specific to one navigation request.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用`navigationState`瀏覽處理，是一個巡覽要求的特定傳遞資料。

trans-unit.source: The following event arguments provide access to navigation state: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event).
trans-unit.target: 下列事件引數提供導覽狀態的存取:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>(傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>事件)。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event handlers).
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>(傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>， <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>，<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>事件處理常式)。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>物件使用初始化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的所需的內容。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], pass an object containing navigation state for processing during navigation, and sandbox the content.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式瀏覽位於來源內容[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，傳遞包含導覽狀態期間瀏覽，並以沙箱處理內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is only for standalone applications and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是只對獨立應用程式和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]內容。

trans-unit.source: This method exhibits the same behavior as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and extends it by ensuring that the content that is being downloaded is placed into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions - see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會表現相同的行為<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，並確保下載的內容會放入部分信任安全性沙箱擴充 (使用預設網際網路區域的一組權限-請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>物件使用初始化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的所需的內容。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。

trans-unit.source: Download content into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 下載內容至部分信任安全性沙箱 (預設值網際網路區域組權限，如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content*> property, although it may not have completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 當所巡覽的內容已經找到，且可從<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content*>屬性，但它可能尚未完成載入。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content*>

trans-unit.source: You handle Navigated if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading commences.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要時下載開始探索有關巡覽要求的相關資訊，請處理 Navigated。

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the Navigated event handler, and includes: - The source page.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊可從<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>物件，傳遞至 Navigated 事件處理常式，並包括:-來源 頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When Navigated is raised, at least part of the source page's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tree has been parsed, and attached to target content control.
trans-unit.target: Navigated 引發時，[來源] 頁面的最少部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]已剖析，並附加至目標內容的控制項樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: - The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: -要求[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: - The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: -[導覽器] (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -如果透過呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>初始化巡覽其他資料

trans-unit.source: - Response details (using a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object).
trans-unit.target: -回應詳細資料 (使用<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>物件)。</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: Navigated is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is raised.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽時 [來源] 頁面無法找到或載入，在此情況下，不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>，就會引發。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>引發<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>，它也會引發<xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>事件<xref:System.Windows.Application>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.
trans-unit.target: 要求新的瀏覽時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Navigating is raised when a new navigation is requested, but before the source content is requested, including when: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽時已要求新的瀏覽，但來源之前要求內容，包括何時引發:-<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> is called (or an entry is selected from a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>稱為 (或從瀏覽選取某個項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)])。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A content fragment is navigated to.
trans-unit.target: -若要巡覽內容片段。

trans-unit.source: You handle Navigating if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request before navigation starts.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要探索有關巡覽要求瀏覽啟動之前的相關資訊，您可以處理巡覽。

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> object that is passed to the Navigating event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊可從<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>傳遞至 Navigating 事件處理常式的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object for the navigation is created and available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> parameter; because the actual request hasn't been made at this point, you can reconfigure the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>物件瀏覽已建立且可從<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>參數，因為實際的要求尚未被這個時候，您可以重新設定<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>物件，如有必要。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: You also handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> to cancel navigation, if required, by setting <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> to true.
trans-unit.target: 您也處理<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>取消瀏覽，必要時，藉由設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>為 true。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you cancel navigation, no other navigation events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您取消瀏覽時，會不引發任何其他瀏覽事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your application is hosted in the browser, you cannot prevent the user from navigating away from your application by canceling the Navigating event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果瀏覽器中裝載您的應用程式，您無法防止使用者在不用離開您的應用程式，藉由取消 Navigating 事件。

trans-unit.source: After the first piece of content is navigated to by a navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), each piece of content that is navigated away from is added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 內容的第一段巡覽至巡覽器之後 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)，每一項從巡覽至別處的內容新增至巡覽記錄。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: If you need to save state information about the content you are navigating away from, you can add the state to the journal entry for that content by setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要儲存您要離開的瀏覽之內容的相關狀態資訊時，您可以將狀態新增至日誌項目，該內容設定<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>與<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises Navigating, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>引發巡覽，它也會引發<xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>事件<xref:System.Windows.Application>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error occurs while navigating to the requested content.
trans-unit.target: 導覽至要求的內容時，發生錯誤時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: When either a <xref:System.Net.WebException> or an <xref:System.IO.IOException> is thrown during a navigation, the NavigationFailed event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.Net.WebException>或<xref:System.IO.IOException>導覽時，就會引發事件 NavigationFailed 期間擲回。</xref:System.IO.IOException> </xref:System.Net.WebException>

trans-unit.source: NavigationFailed is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> that encapsulates information about both the exception and the details of the navigation that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞 NavigationFailed<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs>封裝例外狀況，並造成此例外狀況所巡覽的詳細資料的相關資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an exception results from a failed navigation, and is unhandled, the following events are raised in the order listed: - NavigationFailed.
trans-unit.target: 當例外狀況會從失敗的瀏覽，且未經處理時，在列出的順序引發下列事件:-NavigationFailed。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: If a navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) is hosted by one or more navigators, `NavigationFailed` is not raised on any of them.
trans-unit.target: 如果導覽 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) 由一或多個導覽器`NavigationFailed`它們其中任何一個上就不會引發。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供導覽進度資訊下載期間定期發生。

trans-unit.source: NavigationProgress is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs> which exposes the following progress information: - Number of bytes downloaded so far (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 傳遞 NavigationProgress<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs>公開下列進度資訊:-已下載的位元組到目前為止 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>)。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - Number of total bytes to download (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -若要下載的總位元組數目 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>)。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>

trans-unit.source: NavigationProgress is raised once for every 1024 bytes of content downloaded, and once more if the number of remaining bytes is ever less than 1024 bytes.
trans-unit.target: NavigationProgress 會針對每個 1024 個位元組的內容下載之後，以及引發一次的剩餘的位元組數目是否曾經低於 1024 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, handling NavigationProgress provides a useful way to track and display the progress of a current download.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，處理 NavigationProgress 提供實用的方式來追蹤和顯示目前下載的進度。

trans-unit.source: NavigationProgress won't be raised in some cases, such as when the same piece of content is navigated to, or when a content fragment is navigated to on content that is currently loaded (that is, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，例如當相同的內容瀏覽至時，或內容片段巡覽至目前載入的內容時不會引發 NavigationProgress (也就是值<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final NavigationProgress event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽至已編譯的 XAML 資源，可能不會引發的最後一個 NavigationProgress 事件。

trans-unit.source: This means that at the end of the download, the last reported <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> value may not equal the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，在下載結束時，上次報告<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>值可能不等於<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event to be notified when the navigation has finished.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>瀏覽已完成時收到通知的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises NavigationProgress, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>引發 NavigationProgress，它也會引發<xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName>事件<xref:System.Windows.Application>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading*> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading*>呼叫方法時，或新的瀏覽要求時進行目前的瀏覽時。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading*>

trans-unit.source: You handle NavigationStopped if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要下載已停止時，探索有關巡覽要求的相關資訊，請處理 NavigationStopped。

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the NavigationStopped event handler, and includes: - The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊可從<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>物件，傳遞至 NavigationStopped 事件處理常式，並包括:-要求[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: -[導覽器] (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -如果透過呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>初始化巡覽其他資料

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises NavigationStopped, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>引發 NavigationStopped，它也會引發<xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName>事件<xref:System.Windows.Application>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: 重新載入目前的內容。

trans-unit.source: If the current content (specified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> property) is navigated to again, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not download the content again.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的內容 (的值所指定<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>屬性) 再次，巡覽至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>不會再次下載內容。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: To force <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to re-navigate to the content, call Refresh.
trans-unit.target: 若要強制<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>若要重新瀏覽至內容，呼叫 重新整理。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or Refresh, a new entry is not added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果同樣地，巡覽至目前的內容是否藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>或重新整理，新的項目不會加入至 瀏覽歷程記錄。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: 移除後的歷程記錄中的最新的日誌項目。

trans-unit.source: If two or more navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use RemoveBackEntry to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個或多個導覽器 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) 共用相同的瀏覽歷程記錄、 一個導覽器可以使用 RemoveBackEntry 擷取發生在另一個的導覽巡覽向後巡覽歷程記錄項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: The most recent <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry"></xref> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 最近<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry"></xref>中向後巡覽記錄，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的目前內容中，或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]目前所巡覽的新內容。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) navigates to the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為不同[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]於目前所顯示，[導覽器] (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) 巡覽至指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: Source is set to the content that is loaded from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 來源設定為載入來源內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，瀏覽至時，除非則會取消巡覽。

trans-unit.source: Source can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], and can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 可以設定來源片段只使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，而且可以設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>包含[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]目前的內容，或目前所巡覽的內容。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: 會停止進一步下載目前的瀏覽要求的內容。

trans-unit.source: StopLoading can be called as soon as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫 StopLoading 儘速<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>傳回，並停止正在執行中子框架的導覽。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Calling the StopLoading method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 StopLoading 方法引發<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > StopLoading must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > StopLoading 必須初始化巡覽在相同執行緒上呼叫。
